name: The Devil's Route
description:
Its late at night and you are driving a bus.
What could possibly go wrong...

This game features a total of 6 endings.
Collecting all endings can take between 30 and 45 minutes

name: Ruins: The Gate of Rebirth
description: You will play a dark knight who goes into the dungeon, a corrupt village, and a scary graveyard to explore, holds magic cards, repels the enemy, and finally investigates the strange things that happened in Omos Village

name: Cats Super Bundle
description: It is a beautiful 2D pixel art game for all ages. Where you are a cat, you must avoid obstacles and beat enemies looking for the end of each stage.

name: Stab
description: Escape from the house of a crazy and chatty killer... Accomplish objectives and collect points... Get your name on the leaderboard.

name: Tempest Enterprise
description: Tempest Enterprise is a new episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Truck Simulator 2023: Driver Europe
description: Truckers Wanted: Conquer the Challenge, Own the Highway!

name: The Thief Simulator 2023: From Crook to Boss
description: Advance from novice to crafty pro, executing daring heists and outsmarting police in a captivating world of intrigue and danger!

name: Hentai Devil
description: Hentai Devil is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Medice To Arms
description: Medice To Arms is a PvP 2D battle game where you strategically arrange organs to harness power and avoid attacks from your opponent.

name: Quarta Amethyst
description: When Olicts, a variety of monsters that prey exclusively on humanoids, begin to surge in the region, Quarta Amethyst, a knight of the Quarta Order sworn to defend the innocent from the Olict menace, is tasked with finding the cause, and put a stop to it.

name: Main Action
description: Main Action - 3d top-down shooter with pixel graphics, not a long game with magic and monsters. In this game you will save the world and the villagers from evil. You are a magical creature who alone must cope with evil.

name: Hero of Fate
description: "Hero of Fate" is a rogue game combining the elements of "survivors" and "role-playing". In the midst of monsters, you will encounter various tasks or sudden events. You can recruit partners or become a lone wolf and experience an exciting and unpredictable adventure in this fantastic world!

name: Confabulation: Homestead
description: Horror puzzle game with spot-the-difference elements for survival. Complete interesting puzzles throughout your home to gain access to more areas and unlock more of the story all while using your modified camera to survive the threat that is lurking.

name: Oyabu Clinic Deathcare Corporation
description: Alchemy with patients' lives and health insurance! A quack doctor simulation game. Don't imitate any of this!

name: Tead
description: Tead is a murder mystery visual novel game.

name: Ruined Vacation
description: Ruined vacation is a wad composed of three (plus a credits map) action packed levels to kick some ass through

name: Viva Hexagon! Feat. Ipulo
description: Viva Hexagon! is a tile-matching versus puzzle game, where you have to match hexagonal cells by controlling a small playable platforming character on the board to pick up and move pieces. Featured game modes include versus mode, which can be played against a friend or an A.I. opponent, solo mode, which can be played by yourself, and battle mode, which can be played against a friend or an A.I. opponent. There is also a custom game option, which gives you a myriad of options to customize for all 3 game modes, as well as alternate rules such as changing what happens to the opponent when you score matches.

name: My Peterinary
description:
Time management in a veterinary clinic.

Hurry to heal all the pets! Cater to a variety of animals and discover them all. They need various treatments that will test your skill and speed.

name: MKDD Extended v2.0
description: A major update for MKDD Extended, which added many custom tracks and battle arenas.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: Unofficial port of Fruit Ninja for the PSP.

name: Final Clue Oakloon
description: Final Clue Oakloon is a Gritty Dark VHS Urbex Homicide Detective Survival Horror with combat and emphasis on atmosphere, as well as unpredictability, realism and providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned overgrown house in the woods & the feeling of being stalked during your investigation for the truth about an old crime case, you will have to fight your way through whoever resides here in order to come to the truth and conclusion of this old case.

name: Pac-Man Escape
description:
This is a complete reworking of Game Boy Lock ‘N Chase into a very fun Pac-Man game called “Pac-Man Escape“. Can Pac-Man rescue Ms. Pac-Man from the evil ghosts??

All of the graphics have received a nice Pac-Man style facelift. Including the 4 different types of ghost.

The 2 doors at your disposal on each maze now stay permanently shut. (They only lasted a few seconds in the original Lock ‘N Chase.) This adds more strategy to the gameplay. If you trap a ghost inside of these 2 doors you will recieve bonus points. Which also makes the rest of that maze easier. But be sure to not trap yourself… you will have to restart if you do!

name: Kompete
description: Kompete is an all-in-one multiplayer game. Current game modes include Blitz Royale and Kart Race, with more coming soon! Now in Early Access.

name: Reikai Nikki
description: Reikai Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame where you explore and collect effects in Otsuki's dreams. Unlike most Yume Nikki fangames, it contains dialogues.

name: Fashion Princess: Ultimate Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and both DLC: Extra Levels and Special Levels with additional levels! New adventures! New fun!

name: Pure Mini Golf and Pool Puzzles Bundle
description: Experience the ultimate gaming combo with Pool Puzzles and Pure Mini Golf!

name: Him
description:
In the music galaxy, a prince awaits an attack from outsiders.

Thousands of spaceships entered the galaxy to mine what does not belong to them! Him is a third person casual game where the player runs and jump between home planets to destroy the invading space pirates and their spaceships under a limited time before they mine the lands.

You will have the option to choose between different instruments. Each instrument represent a different shooting style for the player. Choose carefully which shooting style you want to play with based on what goals you want to accomplish.

name: KilaFlow
description: Play as the mascot of a blazing fast (for it's time) antivirus software to clear out corruptions and viruses from various devices around a town.

name: Sonic Treading Power
description: Sonic Treading Power is a fan game made for SAGE 2023.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Gearhead
description: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Gearhead is the fourth episode of the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series,

name: Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the Year Edition
description:
Ready to get swole? Swolemochao has a workout routine for you! But, it seems there's something odd about him, as if he's testing you more than training you. Find out the truth! Afterwards, find out what happened when Dr. Robotnik finds the fate of Swolemochao's mission. A depressed Player encounters Dr. Robotnik's newest scheme, the Mean Muscle Machine! Can you succeed with the perils that unfold?

Slapped together in a single package, Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the Year Edition offers both games for you with remastered art and updated gameplay changes to improve upon the original 12 hour made first game, and extra bells and whistles for the not-made-in-12-hours sequel!

name: Lylia's Deadline
description: Lylia's Deadline is an action-platformer inspired by games such as Mega Man X, focusing on new mechanics and movements.

name: Funtography: A Gameboy Cameradventure
description: In Funtography, enjoy looking at 100+ Gameboy Camera pictures as you explore various urban vistas to solve the mystery of a missing video game prototype.

name: Sonic 04
description: A loving tribute to the good old days when Sonic fangames were worse than the official onres.

name: Choujin Sentai Jetman
description:
Two years have passed since the Jetman triumphed over the evil Vyram faction and saved the Earth. Humanity has flourished again, but peace is fragile, however, one night that peace was destroyed. A remnant of Vyram, hidden in the darkest corners of the universe, has returned to Earth. Renegades and resentful, this group has developed powerful mechanical giants that are wreaking havoc on humanity. They have issued a chilling ultimatum: if the sun goes down, the giants will devastate the world and there will be no hope.​

Faced with this desperate situation, the Choujin Sentai Jetman are forced to meet again to face the greatest threat they have ever known.

name: Theft Ride Legacy: Deluxe Edition
description:
Gear up for the ultimate treasure hunt on wheels!
Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure in "Theft Ride Legacy"!
Bundle includes "Extra Color Pack" !

name: 4x4 Offroad Car Exploration
description:
Embark on a thrilling offroad adventure in "4x4 Offroad Car Exploration." Get ready to navigate through rugged terrain, dense forests, and treacherous landscapes to uncover hidden traps. As a fearless explorer, your mission is to traverse the wild and treacherous terrain, locating and collecting all traps to unlock new locations and acquire powerful offroad vehicles.
Each location presents a distinct environment with its own set of traps to conquer.

name: Nights: Moonlight Dreams...
description: Nights: Moonlight Dreams... is a fan game of Nights into Dreams, developed by Marco Medina.

name: Pikmin Finder
description: Pikmin Finder is a mobile browser AR game created to promote Pikmin 4.The gameplay involves looking around to find sprouts, plucking them, and sending those Pikmin to find treasures. The game has 20 treasures to find in total. Once all 20 have been found, a prompt appears to reset all game progress and collect the Pikmin and treasures again.

name: Sonic and the Gunslinger
description: Sonic and the Gunslinger is a mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2 inspired by the Sonic storybook games and with a Wild West theme.

name: Gatoslip: Chapter 0
description: Gatoslip: Chapter 0 is an MS-DOS-themed RPG ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog on the SEGA Genesis / SEGA Mega Drive.

name: Dead Ground Arcade: Ellis Island
description: Now you can visit Ellis Island. You have to survive on the small bridges there. If you succeed in surviving until the final stage, you may face much more stronger walker. Guess who?

name: Mockingbird
description: Mockingbird is a top-down stealth puzzle game. Play as the Mockingbird as you traverse 5 levels, culminating with a fight against an evil warrior!

name: Rescue Team: Mineral of Miracles
description: The extraordinary discovery of a mineral named "Immortalite" has sent shockwaves across the globe. Now you are tasked with uncovering the secrets of this powerful mineral and ensuring it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

name: Stick Slasher
description: Stick Slasher is an epic 2D fighting game where you combat relentless waves of adversaries armed with shields, swords, or guns. Confront a range of enemy types, secure the highest scores, and ascend to the title of the ultimate warrior!

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 5081 Schienenbus
description: Climb into the cab of an Austrian rail legend with the ÖBB 5081 Schienenbus ‘railbus' from RSSLO.

name: Pass Problems
description: Puzzle game for the Playdate with a basketball theme.

name: Diary of Lucie: Hammer Weapon Pack
description: New Weapon: Hammer 13 types of weapons and 14 types of related weapon characteristics are added.

name: 0 Rally Desert Race: Offroad Dirt Simulator
description: 0 Rally Desert Race: Offroad Dirt Simulator will take you on an adrenaline-fueled journey into the heart of rally racing. Get ready to experience the thrill of high-speed off-road competitions in this dynamic game!

name: Legions
description: Legions is retro arcade game where the player defends their army from elimination. A sword paddle is used to bounce a shield ball back and forth against the opposing player. Collect powerups to whittle down the forces of the enemy army or the enemy’s paddle. The last one standing is the victor!

name: Borderlands Collection: Pandora's Box
description:
For the first time ever, get all six Borderlands adventures together in one mayhem-fueled package, all at an incredible value!

Includes all six acclaimed base games from the Borderlands franchise: Borderlands, Borderlands 2, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, Tales from the Borderlands, Borderlands 3, and New Tales from the Borderlands, as well as all of their add-on content, in one giant bundle.

name: Insanity Edged
description: Insanity Edged is a GZDoom mod for Doom 2 with 3 playable maps, a new set of weapons, and a cinematic story line. It takes place in the same universe as Winter's Fury.

name: Art of Speed
description: A game made for the speedrunning community. Fight through the enemies and parkour on platforms to finish the maps as soon as possible.​

name: Super Go-Kart Racing
description: Super Mario Kart began development as a straight-forward go-kart racing game before switching directions and adding elements from the Mushroom Kingdom. Super Go-Kart Racing aims to “recreate” what the original intention of the game was. There are no weapons, coins or jumps. It’s just no-frills racing across 20 brand-new tracks set in realistic go-kart race locations. All of the music and many of the sounds have been changed to create a different experience.

name: Hysteria in Howlsbend
description: Set in a colonial-era New England town driven to hysteria when a beloved member of the community is afflicted by a witch. The player leads the witch hunt by having typed one-on-one conversations with a cast of characters powered by GPT-3.

name: Afternoon
description: Afternoon is a boom-compatible speedmap project by Ludi and their friends. There are 15 maps in total, and one should expect a strong variety of gameplay styles and visuals going in. The difficulty generally scales from IWAD difficulty to Scythe 2, but great care has been given to pacing and making sure each map flows in a cohesive manner.

name: I Miss When the Internet Was Chronological
description: searching the internet for traces of a long gone tumblr blog. a short bitsy game about holding on to deleted memories, the ephemeral nature of the digital landscape (and tumblr’s golden era).

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Workplace Worries
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Relieve your stress by tearing up the workplace in these office themed tables!

name: I Commissioned Some Ladybugs 2
description: I paid more artists to hide ladybugs and aphids in 20 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Lost Dream: Overgrown
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Lost Dream: Overgrown, a serene walking simulator that will take you on a tranquil and introspective journey through a mystical overgrown realm.

name: Hole io: Red Planet DLC
description: Wear crazy skins and visit new Mars map with your friends!

name: Hole io: Freaks DLC
description: Wear freaky skins and visit new SciFi map with your friends!

name: Hole io: Animals DLC
description: Wear animal skins and visit new Farm map with your friends!

name: Hole io
description: Can you move the black hole to swallow the buildings into the hole like an attacking hole master? The clock is ticking, tik tok, tik tok, will you succeed to swallow?

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Back To School Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Weaponry Upgrade and Elite Arsenal with:

- With the Expansion Pack you can fight and survive the zombie apocalypse in a brand new game mode!
- Play new maps or revisit old ones with new weapons.
-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy
-RVL-357-WES pistol: a classic revolver with a timeless design
-BK-47-CAM rifle: a rugged and reliable rifle inspired by the old west
-SN-1100-TRI sniper rifle: a modern-day cowboy sniper rifle

Conquer your enemies in the wild west style!

name: Paper io 2: Mishmash DLC
description:
Conquer new maps with your friends in mishmash skins!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 13 diverse skins: bus, burger, donut, poop, toilet, ufo, robot, ninja, santa, crab, car, police car, airplane
- 5 hats: widget, "truck" cap, helmet with horns, apple with an arrow, witch hat
- 9 custom game maps in the form of a: car, boat, poop, sport bike, cruiser, scooter, headphones, teddy bear, crown
- 10000 coins

Put on funny mishmash skins, change the look of your territory and take over new custom maps!

name: Paper io 2: Animals DLC
description:
Conquer new maps with your friends in animal skins!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 15 animal skins: cow, giraffe, hippo, duck, piggy, rhino, mouse, mammoth, rabbit, dog, snail, white whale, cobra, elephant, unicorn
- 6 hats: fur with ears, guitar, crocodile, police cap, crown, diadem
- 9 custom game maps in the form of a: duck, fish, cat, rabbit, whale, bird, butterfly, octopus, seahorse
- 10000 coins

Put on skins of cute animals, change the look of your territory and take over new custom maps!

name: Paper io 2
description:
Welcome to Paper.io 2, the ultimate conquest game from Voodoo! Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition with a smooth drawing experience!

Are you ready to become the champion of township and take over the game? With Paper.io 2, you can draw your way to victory and claim your space before your opponents beat you to it.

name: Moto Rush GT: Back To School Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Full Garage and Grip Collection #2 with:

- 17 new vehicles—including an ATV and bicycle!
- 8 new gloves
- New colors for the rest of motorbikes
- New colors for gloves
- Special, Golden colors for motorbikes
- four pairs of state-of-the-art racing gloves, crafted for the ultimate grip and control.

name: Knights & Guns: Back To School Edition
description:
Knights & Guns: Back To School Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game, Expansion Pack #1, Expansion Pack #2 and Armor Pack #2 for a total of 20 new levels, 12 new armors and new enemies from both expansions.

A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Leone Abbacchio
description:
Bucciarati's team is fully reunited in All-Star Battle R with the playable character addition of Leone Abbacchio and his detective stand, Moody Jazz. Make your opponents think twice and see double with Leone Abbacchio! Available Now!

Contents:
- Leone Abbacchio as a playable character
- Additional Leone Abbacchio JoJo Glossary, Model Viewer, Sound Test, and Art Viewer
- Additional Leone Abbacchio collection items at the in-game store

name: Aquapark io: Movie Stars DLC
description: Race with your friends in movie stars skins on new Hollywood map!

name: Aquapark io: Sweet and Spooky DLC
description: Race with your friends in sweet and spooky skins on new Candy map!

name: Aquapark io: Animals DLC
description:
- City Cup map
- Summer cat skin
- Magican pig skin
- Rainbow zebra skin
- Cowboy horse skin
- Artist fox skin
- Pilot elephant skin
- Penguin skin
- Chef mouse skin
- Checkered bear skin

Slide, jump, fly and become the fastest animal!

name: Midnight Monitor: Anomaly Watch
description: A "spot the difference" horror game where you have to monitor cameras in a haunted house and report anomalies. You have no choice but to finish the job. Can you spot every anomaly? Can you survive the night?

name: Up or Lava!
description: Participate in only up races with 100 players. Fall down, and you'll burn in the lava! Play with friends or other players. The last survivor wins. Could it be you?

name: Validus Mortis
description: Validus Mortis is a 2D platformer in fantasy style. To stop the evil wizards of taking control of the land. explore the stage with your hero knight and find items to progress forward. Slay monsters and gain experience and new spells.

name: Boom Arena
description: Boom Arena is free to play, real time, head-to-head strategy game. Test your combat skills against players from all around the world! Available on Android and IOS.

name: Holua's Arcades
description: Get ready to dive back into the pure joy of gaming. Prepare yourself for four thrilling games inspired by the arcade genre's all-time favorites. From challenging platformers, to epic space battles and classic beat'em up action. It's like having four arcade machines at your fingertips!

name: Labyrinthum
description: Labyrinthum is an exciting maze game that offers a unique gaming experience combining puzzles, riddles, and general knowledge challenges.

name: The Legend of Ogorets 1: Wrat
description: An immersive, barebones-style interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Not for heroes.

name: STSP: Super Titty Space Prison
description: STSP: Super Titty Space Prison is a fast fast-paced momentum based platformer with a high skill ceiling. Master bunny hopping, wall jumping, and slamming to defeat the prison and your friends!

name: Soul Keeper
description: Soul Keeper! Story based platform game. Sometimes it will drive you crazy with its difficulty, but it will drag you along with its story. Overcome obstacles, pass levels and collect the story!

name: Banners of Ruin: Iris
description: Summon spirits that augment your party with the haunted fox, Iris!

name: SexWife: No Limit
description: No limit is adult visual novel with puzzle elements. Follow your hidden desires with sexy hot wife cheating on her husband.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Dropout!
description: A SFW port to Nintendo Switch.

name: Behind the Horizon: The Sky Fortress
description: Expands the game Behind the Horizon with a new exciting main story, many new areas, items, spells, new pets and plants ! - A farm RPG in a nature simulation that keeps changing the world. Dive into a new adventure! BtH-The Sky Fortress awaits you...

name: Bunny Guys!
description: Welcome to Bunny Guys! Climb, explore and have fun or be frustrated? Fight your way to the top with full of obstacles that want to stop you from reaching the top.

name: The Bugger!
description: Welcome to Silicon Island, where you are the only programmer in town! You enjoy the simple life of diskettes and dial-up connections, until one day your boss ruins it with an email. He sends you some files to review, but your computer explodes and releases a swarm of bugs that infect the island.

name: The Sinking of the Dream Chaser
description: Servant robot Led reboots in the stern of the ship Dream Chaser, only to find he's broken and malfunctioning. His memory drives have been corrupted. He has no idea what's going on. And he needs your help to find out what happened to himself, the ship, and to his master.

name: I'm on Observation Duty 6
description: The most ambitious I'm on Observation Duty game yet with six unique levels. Gameplay is familiar to those who have played the previous games. The game is part of a series of popular "spot the difference" -type of horror games. In I'm on Observation Duty 6 the players job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. You can swap between different camera-views. An anomaly means that for example something (e.g. a piece of furniture) has moved, an extra object has appeared or something has disappeared. There's also scary intruders. When you notice something is different in any of the monitored rooms you have to file a report by clicking on the anomaly or choosing the right location and type of the anomaly from a menu to fix it. Anoamalies appear at random so the player never knows what is going to hapen next. Too many active and unreported anomalies means game over. Goal is to survive long enough (from 00:00 to 06:00 in game time). You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night. The game contains psychological horror that mainly comes from making the player paranoid about what has changed in the house. There are also some scary monsters that might appear.

name: Starfield: Premium Edition
description:
Starfield is the first new universe in over 25 years from Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4. In this next generation role-playing game set amongst the stars, create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity’s greatest mystery.

Premium Edition includes:
- Starfield Base Game
- Shattered Space Story Expansion (upon release)
- Up to 5 days early access*
- Constellation Skin Pack: Equinox Laser Rifle, Spacesuit, Helmet and Boost Pack
- Access to Starfield Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack

name: End of Knights
description: Destroy unholy hoards of the undead and defend your stronghold! Gain new abilities and hone your skills in this challenging arcade action game. Can you survive the End of Knights?

name: Mega Man X Dive Offline
description:
The newest entry in the hit action series Mega Man X makes its way to Steam and smartphones! Strengthen your characters and weapons with a variety of powerups to make them all your own. Then test them out in the side-scrolling action of "what-if" worlds in Mega Man X!

This product is the offline version of Mega Man X DiVE. Online features such as Battle Mode, Co-op, Ranking, Guild, and Capsule are not included. Collaboration contents such as characters and stages from other Capcom franchises are not available in the game.

name: LumiereMagna
description: 3D action fighting with 4 types of magic Defeat the monsters that await you in the ancient ruins Infinite game magic action game

name: The Night Market
description: Welcome to the Night Market. Survive your journey while navigating a foreign land, rife with political intrigue, arbitrary rules and secrets designed to keep you distracted. Fall in love, explore a world with rich characters, and try to save the realm.

name: Waterfall Prisoner
description: Can you escape from Waterfall Tower? A point and click puzzle game made in the vein of old-school graphic adventure classics.

name: Glass Wings
description: Glass Wings is a fast paced third-person parkour platformer. Explore a stunning minimalist world in a series of linear courses in which your only objective is to complete the level. No combat, no story - just run.

name: Escape From Lavender Island
description: Escape from Lavender Island is a 3rd person open world exploration game. Follow Zede Aksis as he wakes up from a dream about a city only to realize that what he saw in his sleep is a physical reality he cannot find a way out of.

name: The Riflemen
description: The Riflemen is a fun, fast-paced low poly FPS game where matches are short and full of action! All players start with bolt-action rifles & knives that they don't need to reload. Players can customize their weapons & characters to get the look that they want!

name: Usagi Shima
description: Usagi Shima is a relaxing, idle bunny collecting game. You’ve been tasked as caretaker of an abandoned island — as you decorate it over time, curious (but adorable!) bunny visitors start to appear! Buy toys, plants, and build structures on an abandoned island to entice curious bun tourists to pay your island a visit. Discover, take photos, and make friends with a variety of bunnies that visit based on how you’ve decorated and arranged the island.

name: Conbunn Cardboard
description: A chill and cozy platformer. Hop around collecting the lost CDs of a cute DJ in this land made of cardboard!

name: SGS Fall Weiss
description: The very first Blitzkrieg campaign of WW2 is covered by this game on a daily basis. And you can also explore alternative situations of different war starts, with the ‘What-if’ scenarios. Man your tanks!

name: Gastro Force
description: The player takes the role of the last soldier of the highly specialized "Gastro Force", elite troopers trained to infiltrate the enormous alien guts to fight them from the inside!

name: Dreamers
description: Dreamers will lead you on an emotional journey in a story about friendship, exploration, and personal growth. Join the three characters in their adventure through a 3D world with secondary storylines and mini-games, vehicles to upgrade, puzzles to solve, and collaborative split-screen experiences.

name: Tiny Witch
description: Tiny Witch, is a little game about managing a minion store, where you must mix the right resources to build the minions needed by the dungeon masters.

name: Void Stranger
description:
Void Stranger is a 2D sokoban-style puzzle game where every step counts.

Descend into the forgotten labyrinth teeming with fiendish foes and traps that defy reason. A swift defeat lurks at every corner for those who neither study their surroundings nor think their moves through with care.
Trust you wits and slowly, surely, you will conquer the mysteries before you.

You do remember why you are here, right?
Or have you lost something?
Something very important to you.

name: Gamble Tower
description: Embark on a high-stakes journey in our roguelite deckbuilder! A place where every decision is a gamble, risk and reward intertwine to shape your odds. Delve into a dark fantasy world brought to life through mesmerizing 2D hand-painted art, where wacky characters and unpredictable challenges await.

name: Eggsplosion
description: Eggsplosion is a free local multiplayer twin-stick arena brawler with fighting chickens, bouncing eggs, tons of power-ups and heaps of fun. Eggcellent for a fun evening with your friends!

name: Kingdom-Heroes
description: Kingdom-Heroes offers real time strategy fun in 2D Pixelart optics and cool atmospheric music and sound. Build up your Colony by placing every building where you want and recruiting as many units as you want! Build outposts, Farming stations or strengthen your defenses!

name: Fortuna Magus
description: Amane, Tia and Lill lived a peaceful life together with their father, Kalius...until Kalius mysteriously disappeared one day. Before leaving, he asked Amane to take care of Tia and Lill. Ten years later, Amane and Tia encounter a magus named Ret, who sets in motion a fateful chain of events.

name: 90 Minute Fever
description: 90 Minute Fever is an online football management game that offers extremely challenging gameplay where you get to compete against others from all over the world!

name: Choose Love
description: The steady boyfriend. The one who got away. The charming rock star. Who will Cami choose? In this interactive rom-com, her love life is in your hands.

name: The Long August Longing
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure In XX City
description: Fan game for the "Of The Killer" game series by thecatamites (aka @garmentdistrict)

name: Sandtrix+
description: Sandtrix+ is an expanded version of the freeware game Sandtrix. It extends the base game with new game modes, challenging color modes, and unlockable themes.

name: Westwich Castle
description: Westwich Castle is a short indie horror game, in which you are a prisoner and have to escape the horrors lurking inside this dark abandoned medieval castle.

name: Golden Idol Mysteries: DLC Bundle
description: Contains 2 DLCs in one bundle!

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Hit Song + VTuber Pack 5
description:
A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from J-POP, ANIME, VTuber!
A DLC pack for Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from J-POP, ANIME, VTuber!

name: Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition
description:
Super Freaks 1 Ultimate Edition is a 2D platformer featuring single player and up to four player drop-in/drop-out cooperative gameplay.
Go to the right, jump on enemy heads, reach the exit, all of that standard stuff. When you select a level, you can choose between any of the Super Freaks before playing, as well as a whole host of other unlockable characters. There are over 20 characters total!

name: Decollate Decoration
description: This is a point-and-click, command-selection style adventure game where the protagonist is a girl who has become a ghost. The objective is to fulfill her desires by speaking to her beloved "him" causing poltergeists, visiting in dreams, or even cursing.

name: Sonic McOrigins Plus
description: An update to Sonic McOrigins that adds Shadow Hockey, Amy/Rouge Volleyball, and Shadow Basketball.

name: Sonic Encore
description: Sonic Encore is a fan game that re-imagines some of the classic levels from the Sonic 2D era into a more modern 3D environmental setting.

name: BrazSonic 20XX
description: BrazSonic 20XX is a reboot of the BrazSonic series set in 20XX's Brazil, where the congressman Dr. Corruptnik, who dreams of being President of the country, seeks the Corruption Emeralds to make it true. However, his ambition implies chaos and destruction to the lands and citizens. Then the hero BrazSonic will come into the scene to stop him!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Dimension Shellshock Bundle
description: Get TMNT: Shredder’s Revenge and its Dimension Shellshock DLC in this bundle!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Ninja Sneaking vs: Battle on the Couch
description:
Asymmetrical Action for 2~4 Players!
Attack & Defense: Become the Greatest Ninja!

name: Bus Simulator: City Driving Ultimate
description: Step into the driver's seat of a variety of meticulously detailed buses and embark on a captivating journey through bustling city streets in "Bus Simulator - City Driving Ultimate" As a skilled bus operator, your mission is to faithfully follow designated routes, pick up passengers, and deliver them safely to their destinations. The city's intricate traffic patterns, unpredictable road conditions, and the needs of your passengers will put your driving prowess and multitasking abilities to the test.

name: The Case of the Golden Idol: Complete Edition
description:
Additional content included:
- The Lemurian Vampire
- The Spider of Lanka
- Soundtrack

name: Dark Lovers: Extended Edition
description: Dark Lovers is a short pixel art teenage romantic mistery visual novel game about a highschool prom night in 1979 which contains multiple endings and secrets.

name: Ducks Can Drive: Penguins Can Too
description: After the ducks taught the penguins how to drive, they are now comfortable enough to face the ducks in racing! With this DLC you will be able to drive as a penguin on top of your standard duck choices. Who will win, Ducks or Penguins? Penguins Can Drive Too!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Yellowstone
description: Ride between mammoths and saber-toothed tigers and survive in the Stone Age.

name: Ronshade
description: "Ronshade" is a turn-based roguelike game. Players collect items and challenge the depths. The turn system displays action results, with intuitive and quick controls. Over 100 unique items greatly influence combat outcomes.

name: 808s&Genetics
description: A puzzle game that combines nonogram and genetics rules.

name: Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3
description: Space Engineers Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3 includes Warworn Armor Skin, Cab Cockpit, Twin-blade Wind Turbine, Colorable Solar Panels, Holo LCD, Inset LCD panel, Sloped LCD panel, Curved LCD panel, Round Beacon, Inset Couch, Inset Bed, Inset Button Panel, Entertainment Corner and many more.

name: Troopers
description: A singleplayer first-person shooter in a low poly art! Play epic matches in different game modes, rank up and unlock new weaponskins, attachments and weapons.

name: Arcade Archives: Cadash
description: Face countless dangers on your quest to save Princess Sarasa from the clutches of the evil Barrog !

name: The Legend of Super Mario: Save Mushroom Kingdom
description:
Welcome to Mushroom Kingdom, where Bowser has captured Princess Toadstool and thrown the Kingdom into tyranny. It is up to a heroic plumber named Mario to find all Starmen, become super and save the day!

Along the way you’ll be challenged by Goombas, Koopas and an endless array of ruthless creatures who will stop at nothing to prevent you from finding the 8 Starmen of power. Please hurry up and rescue Peach!

name: Bleak
description: An atmospheric mini wad with the vibes of atmospheric horror, fear of the unknown, Lovecraft inspired.

name: PowerWash Simulator: The Muckingham Files 2
description: Three new filthy maps have arrived in PowerWash Simulator in the latest instalment of The Muckingham Files; a series of free content updates expanding the game’s original universe. Whilst residents dish the dirt on your favourite town’s antics, you’ll be busy cleaning up their messes as you're tasked with de-dirtying an Excavator, a Spanish Villa and a Paintball Arena.

name: A Little to the Left: Deep Clean
description: These new food-themed Snack Pack levels come as part of the Deep Clean update, which also adds two new puzzle types into the Daily Tidy mode and a fan-requested Archive mode.

name: Golden Idol Mysteries: The Lemurian Vampire
description: Unravel the truth of an ancient civilisation, lost in time through three brand-new scenarios, filled with death, deceit, and ancient rituals.

name: Spaceminers
description: Welcome to the world of Spaceminers and our exclusive pre-alpha release Spaceminers: Gold Runner. This thrilling game mode serves as the first step in your journey towards becoming a skilled Spaceminer.

name: First Strike: Multiplayer
description: The multiplayer mode for First Strike is here! Wage nuclear war against other players from all over the world and nuke the Earth into nuclear Armageddon together. Will you be the last one remaining when the whole world blows to smithereens?

name: Sex Simulator: CamGirl Audition 2
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements, where you play the role of an attractive woman looking for models for her studio.

name: Masala Drive
description: Super high-occupancy over 1000%! How many passengers on the bus can you goal with? Many Masala sound BGM for driving.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Limitless Bunny Pack
description: Expand your AEW playable roster with The Bunny and Keith Lee and gain access to two brand new minigames: MJF Car Thrash and Sloth Sling.

name: QUByte Classics: Gourmet Warriors
description: Save the city from demonic mutant robots attempting to take over!

name: Catlord
description: Step into the paws of the legendary Catlord! Survive in a shrinking area, fight off hordes of enemies, and grow more powerful with each run to claim victory!

name: Trapped in the Dim Mansion
description: You wake up to find yourself in a dim mansion. Can you clear all the tricks and get away from it?

name: Baseball Club
description: Baseball club is finally here! Pitcher-batter duels, cool items and upgrades to unlock, and most importantly - intuitive and engaging gameplay - this is the quick baseball game you’ve been waiting for!

name: Buggy Racer
description: Become a legendary driver and the fastest in the whole world. Unforgettable adventure full of drifts, jumps and nitrous oxide!

name: Goblin Daily Life
description: Goblin Daily Life - 3D walking game with elements of time management and survival. You have to perform the routine work of a usual goblin, whose duties include maintaining order in the forest. Have time to feed the animals, harvest, heat the house and many others tasks.

name: Lost Alien
description: Lost Alien is a 2D pixel game that combines elements of platformer, puzzles and planetary exploration. Move through the levels passing various obstacles, dodging enemies, use the jetpack.

name: Intergalactic
description: Destroy Asteroids and Ships, Explore Space!

name: Fatrifice 2
description: The demoness Shar, summoned by a group of girls who performed a fatrifice, wants to become even stronger! And how will she do that, you ask? That's a good question, by another fatrifice!

name: Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3
description: Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3 is a prologue to Little Kingdoms, a medieval real-time strategy game with stylistic low poly graphics and relaxing music. Your goal is to conquer the neighboring kingdoms and grow your empire.

name: Dungeon of Horror
description: Dungeon of Horror - a 2D-pixel dungeon labyrinth, where you play as a girl trying to find the way out and discover all the dark corners of this frightening place. Watch your steps, avoid traps, collect all loot and escape the dungeon!

name: Falls and Jumps
description: Falls and Jumps is an endless 2D platform game about where you need to stay alive by jumping on platforms that appear for a short time and avoiding deadly traps. Your task is to hold out as long as possible.

name: Mini Cars Puzzle
description: Mini Cars Puzzle is a 3D puzzle where you need to unload the parking lot occupied by cars and help each driver get out of the parking lot without harming other cars.

name: Off-Road Rides
description: Off-Road Rides is an exciting 3D driving game in which you have to drive a car of your choice and avoid obstacles on a construction side off-road scenery.

name: Floating Coffin
description: A short cinematic survival experience where you attempt to survive on a failing satellite. Worry about all the survival essentials along with a ever growing blackhole named Ebon Void pulling lethal debris your way.

name: Colorful Boi
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled journey like no other with Colorful Boi! This captivating platformer boasts 63 levels of intense gameplay, filled with treacherous traps.

name: The World's Hardest Game: On Steam
description: I present you The World's Hardest Game... On Steam! An aesthetic take on a classic browser game from 2008. Wait, are you sure you're ready to face The World's Hardest Game again? With aesthetic visuals and enhanced gameplay? Oh, and a revamped soundtrack? Alright. You can try.

name: Warlock The Bounty Hunter
description: A short byte-sized roguelike game where you play as a warlock taking bounties.

name: Jelly Fruits Adventure: Magic Match 3 Puzzle
description: Match 3 is a popular puzzle game in which you have to be careful and collect all the fruits three in a row!

name: World War 1
description: Dive into the epic saga of 'World War 1.' Navigate a realm consumed by conflict, unite forces, and lead mighty champions. Delve into the enigma of the fractured world and wield destiny's reins. The battle for existence is underway.

name: Urbo: Dream One
description: Urbo: Dream One is a meditative puzzle game where you build houses around the mysterious Tower. Let your mind wander through visions of an enchanted city on an island in the middle of the crystal clear waters of a vibrant lake.

name: Rotting Rumble: Zombie Football
description: Run to the end zone in this 3D platformer as you're chased by hordes of zombies! Collect weapons and items to fight back against the undead. Can you outrun the zombie horde?

name: Forgenator
description: "Forgenator" is an item crafting game where players take on the role of a forge apprentice. With the guidance of a powerful wizard, players take on exciting challenges to craft powerful weapons, armor, and items.

name: Mini Garden Cafe
description: Mini Garden Cafe is a cute and simple relaxation game where you make and sell coffee, bread, and plants to expand your shop and fill up a Dex.

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Ch. Fubuki: Fubuki's Luckiest Day
description: The second DLC for Master Detective Archives: Rain Code is a substory that features protagonist Fubuki Clockford, and allows players to control the Master Detective with the Forensic Forte "Time Leap."

name: 10Minutes
description: This game is a single player FPS where you have 10 minutes to fight zombies in different locations, test your zombie survival skills and compete for high scores.

name: Tenebris Pictura
description: Exploration, ghost hunting and puzzles in the Victorian era.

name: Goddess Detective 2
description: A newly married couple suddenly lost their engagement ring, according to the hostess. That day she went out to buy food, only out for ten minutes. When I came back, the ring was gone, but of course it was later discovered. But she hasn't been out since.

name: Starfield: Constellation Edition
description: In this next generation role-playing game set amongst the stars, create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity’s greatest mystery.

name: Tamer Vale
description: Tamer Vale is a turn based card battler, where a collective of Elven heroines, known as Tamers, journey forth beyond the safety of their hidden valley to find and confront the sources of corruption in the land, and bring balance to it using their special rituals!

name: Hainya World
description: You are an adventurer, you need to explore this continent, make good use of the resources of this continent to arm yourself, explore this world full of monsters and unknown things and survive!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Dimension Shellshock
description: Chaos! The Neutrinos crash the Turtles’ latest pizza party! The teenagers from Dimension X are in dire need of help: Shredder is seeking to conquer the multiverse itself!

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Shadows of Change
description: This DLC will add three Legendary Lords (1 for each race), a Legendary Hero and new units.

name: Crescent Quest
description: Crescent Quest is a mostly medieval turn based open world RPG that is inspired by old 2000s MMO designs while being a single player experience. Increase your skills, go on unique quests, grind for and collect rare items, be a part of the constantly changing world of Reltionus!

name: High Sea Saga DX
description: Set sail and join yer crew in search of treasure and glory!

name: Taito Milestones 2
description: On the heels of last year’s first Taito Milestones comes a new collection with more of Taito’s arcade classics.

name: The Tenants: Pets
description: Experience the joy of bringing people and pets together in this delightful expansion for The Tenants. Build your property empire with a pet-friendly approach, and watch your business thrive as you satisfy animal lovers in Wondersville!

name: Seven Nights Ghost
description: "Peaceful days full of curses" Heartwarming FPS horror exploration game about 7 days of strange communal living with ghosts

name: Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy
description:
Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy will take Amadeus the Wizard, Zoya the Thief, and Pontius the Knight on their most action-packed journey yet!

Traverse breathtaking 2.5D landscapes in Trine‘s deepest and visually richest chapter to date, with an all new cast of characters – some friends, some foes, but all unforgettable.

Whether by yourself or playing with up to three friends in online and local co-op, the upgraded puzzle difficulty system keeps things fresh, adapting the challenge to the number of players.

Level up the heroes' abilities with the all-new skill quest system, growing their legend as they are once again united by… the Trine!

name: Jeff: The Hungry Fish
description: Jeff: The Hungry Fish is a single-player mode, aquatic themed arcade-style game where you play as a hungry little fish. Prey on other fishes or be preyed on instead. Evade predators as you dine until you can eat the predators themselves. Rise above the food chain and become the apex predator!

name: Dream Fire
description: Dream Fire offers a unique and captivating experience, which will keep you in suspense and delight you both with its unique story and graphics, as well as with the fact that you will always have something to do to develop yourself more and more!

name: Radiant Tale: Fanfare!
description: Fandisc for Radiant Tale.

name: Great North Shelter 2
description: Great North Shelter 2 is an atmospheric adventure with a deep story, detailed world and horror elements.

name: How 2 Escape
description: How 2 Escape is an escape-simulation game where two players will need to cooperate on asymmetrical gameplay and devices. "Talk together. Help each other." will be your new motto to survive in How 2 Escape.

name: Colorless
description: Colorless In this puzzle and platform game, players must manipulate the perspective of the game world to solve increasingly complex puzzles.

name: Curt Maddox
description: This is an adventure game with visual novel elements. Explore this Wild West town and the stories of its inhabitants! Bring about new relationships and solve their problems like a good sheriff who is not at all a hustler in a paper-thin disguise should!

name: Skator Gator 3D
description: Stop the mayor from polluting the swamp in this short, 3D adventure! Explore new open locales with skateboard in hand or while grinding on pipelines - Greenjamin's skating into the third dimension in Skator Gator 3D!

name: Cardbob
description: Explore the sci-fi dungeons, collect loot, and negotiate the highest prices in this action roguelite, set in a 3D cardboard world. Grow stronger with each attempt. Be the unlikely hero.

name: Chess Survivors
description: Chess Survivors is a grid based, quick-turn, roguelike where you outmaneuver and destroy an ever growing horde of chess enemies. Combine abilities and upgrades to create game-breaking builds. Unlock cosmetics, characters, and powerful relics. Think fast, die, learn, repeat.

name: Graviators
description: Graviators is a team arena sports game in space! Compete against friends in pinball-like arenas.Use your spacepods special gravity and shield abilities to control and shoot the ball and score points on the enemy goal.Engage in multiple game modes and arenas with exciting gameplay!

name: Ou
description:
"Between somewhere and someone."
U-chronia is a mysterious world constantly changing like a book whose pages are flipped out of order. You will wear the shoes of OU, the protagonist, to live through this game-shaped experience—without knowing what it really is.

name: Pocket Bravery
description:
Pocket Bravery is inspired by classics from the 90s, such as Street Fighter, Fatal Fury and The King of Fighters. And its SD aesthetic had an influence on games like Pocket Fighter and other fighting games from Neo Geo Pocket Color.

But make no mistake, Pocket Bravery was created to be a new and unique fighting game, with original characters, vibrant colors and a combat system that will impress you, since the game was designed with the focus on high level players. Even so, it has features that will teach beginning players how to develop and evolve in the game.

The game uses the digital pad and four buttons, two for punches and two for kicks. You can execute the traditional commands from the fighting games using the directional pad plus the button to make special moves, super specials or even the final attack. Each character has an element that represents his strength, can be physical or supernatural. You can accumulate up to 2 attacks on the elemental bar. Through this system, it is possible to execute elemental attacks that have different characteristics from the others and bring new offensive or defensive possibilities for the player.

name: Dynast.io
description: 100 player 2D real-time massive multiplayer survival game in your browser! Build, Craft, Fight, Survive!

name: Metanoia
description: Metanoia is a visual novel that explores the fear of being trapped in a psychiatric ward and unable to leave, as well as the fear of an incredibly unethical doctor not having your best interests at heart.

name: Drums Rock: Undertale - 'Hopes And Dreams'
description:
Get the track 'Hopes And Dreams' from the Undertale game! This track is part of the Undertale DLC.

To gain access to the exclusive Undertale Scene and Skins, you must have the songs MEGALOVANIA and Hopes And Dreams.
Both songs are available through the Undertale DLC Bundle.

name: Drums Rock: Undertale - 'Megalovania'
description:
Get the track 'Megalovania' from the Undertale game! This track is part of the Undertale DLC.

To gain access to the exclusive Undertale Scene and Skins, you must have the songs MEGALOVANIA and Hopes And Dreams.
Both songs are available through the Undertale DLC Bundle.

name: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: + Rayman Edition
description:
The + Rayman Edition of the game includes:

- The base game.
- DLC 3: Rayman in the Phantom Show.

name: Theatrhythm: FBL - Mana Pack Vol. 2
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Pokemon Myth
description: Pokemon Myth is a fan made pokemon game, set in a new region with a new story, new mega forms, new regional forms, and new custom (fakemon) pokemon to discover.

name: WestQuest for Playdate!
description: Crank (to jump) around to find out best way to collect the gold. Over 30 levels of crankin' action!

name: Dyatlov Canyon
description: This is a collection of seven vanilla compatible maps, with slightly more focus on story.

name: Fling!
description: Take on increasingly challenging levels by jumping your way through different worlds, dodging disaster and avoiding a multitude of hazards as you utilise your better judgment to accurately fling yourself to the end goal of each level!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Launch Edition
description: Be free to fish where you choose in a unique and approachable open world fishing experience. Explore the great outdoors on your own or with friends and find the catch of a lifetime.

name: Sube
description: In this game, you will play a junior high school student who doesn't like learning, and all you have to do every day is go to school, finish school, and sleep.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Deluxe Edition
description: Be free to fish where you choose in a unique and approachable open world fishing experience. Explore the great outdoors on your own or with friends and find the catch of a lifetime.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Official School Bus Extension
description: Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers! It's time to get back into the driver's seat and take on a new challenge as the new school year approaches. Transport your town's kids to their schools safely and in time for their lessons!

name: Trainz Plus: Trainz Model Railroad - The Chuck Ewe Pharlie Railroad
description: The Chuck, Ewe & Pharlie Railroad serves a diverse range of industries and factories in the Smoke Stack industrial regions. These include a steel mill, timber wharf, dry sort yard and more. Two locomotive depots support both steam and diesel locomotives. Five sessions are included.

name: Captain Kalani: Definitive Edition
description: Control the captain after receiving a distress call from the biggest Factory of robots of the world. Discover the utopian world that hide a big mystery, and find out who are the Robot's Syndicate behind the truoubles.

name: Ocean Protector
description: Ocean Protector is a free online educational game that teaches students about the impacts of ocean acidification and how they can take action to prevent it.

name: Bomb Up
description:
Bomb Up is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly falling down. Press a button to fire a bomb and press it again to explode it. Score points by destroying all the red squares within the radius of its explosion. The explosion will bounce you up and to the side and you will turn around when you hit a wall.

The game is over when a red square hits you.

name: 2024 U.S. Election Simulator
description: The 2024 U.S. Election Simulator puts you in control of an American election night like never before. Customize your very own political candidate and run a realistic campaign that leads up to election night!

name: Drift Cars Zombie Crusher
description: Join the gripping battle against the zombie invasion with Drift Cars Zombie Crusher! A breathtaking experience awaits for car enthusiasts and action lovers. Use your drift skills to crush the zombies and survive.

name: Subject Debris
description: Subject Debris is an indie 3D Dungeon-crawler game

name: World of Rune
description: World of Rune is an MMORPG game with tons of different characters and mystical cute pets. You can play as a Swordsman, Mage, Archer and Cleric.

name: Kitten Tales
description: Embark on an exciting quest in Kitten Tales, solve puzzles to find your mother in story mode, and challenge up to 10 players in online races and multiplayer challenges. Do you have what it takes to be the bravest cat?

name: Myths of Rules
description: This is a text-based adventure puzzle game, where you must struggle to survive in a world filled with ghosts and urban legends. While collecting clues, you'll uncover the truth behind the world and find the way out. The game features a wealth of levels, unconventional rules, and a touch of horror.

name: Fi-Knight Kingdom
description: Challenge your friends in this Local Multiplayer RPG Board Game hybrid. Choose a starting class that fits your playstyle. Encounter lots of enemies, fight strong boss monsters and collect gold to buy powerful dice and pieces of equipment to get the upper hand on your opponents.

name: Word Dungeons
description: Word Dungeons borrows attitude from dark and gritty RPGs, and adds these elements to a word game. Solve words, collect loot, power up your runes and discover the mysteries that lay within the dungeon. Can you escape?

name: Hyperforma: Lost Archives - Fragment II
description:
Delve deeper into the Ancient Network with a new DLC Lost Archives — Fragment II.

This DLC includes 30 additional levels. Every 10 new levels refer to specific bosses with all their associated design and mechanics.

Features:

10 new levels in Joker
10 new levels in Warrior
10 new levels in Mother

Uncover the truth of Hyperforma!

name: Hyperforma: Lost Archives - Fragment I
description:
Embark on an immersive journey and get lost archives with a new DLC Lost Archives — Fragment I.

This DLC includes 30 additional levels. Every 10 new levels refer to specific bosses with all their associated design and mechanics.

Features:

・10 new levels in Oracle
・10 new levels in Guardian
・10 new levels in Ghost
・New mechanics to activate the skills

Secrets of the vanished civilization await to be unveiled!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Celestial Eyes Above Mortal Ruins
description:
Version 1.3 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae, Fu Xuan and Lynx
• New main story quest: Obsequies Performed, A Long Road Ahead
• New area: Aurum Alley
• New companion missions for Dan Heng, Luka, March 7th and Lynx
• New main event: Aurum Alley's Hustle and Bustle
• New Simulated Universe mode: The Swarm Disaster
• New QoL changes: Trailblaze Power System Optimization and Phone Wallpaper
• …and more!

name: The Brittle Epoch
description: An immersive short story walking simulator. About an hour to complete for people who enjoy relaxed exploration while investing in a long term narrative project.

name: Space Vikings
description: Pillage and plunder across the galaxy as part of a crew of Space Vikings in this sci-fi roguelite bullet hell dungeon crawler. Find exotic weapons, upgrade them with powerful augments, explore mysterious alien planets, and unleash viking vengeance on their inhabitants.

name: Room In Dream
description: A peaceful, and chill casual puzzle game. Discover, collect, and assemble furniture to decorate your little cozy room and surrounding environment in the peaceful land, feeling the white noise of the nature, time flow and weather change.

name: Bizarre Mushroom Cycle Simulator
description: The bizarre mushrooms will surely bring you surprise and healing. Watch them with enchanting fireflies, and listen to the forest sounds. Experience a unique life only mushrooms offer. Living as a mushroom isn't so bad after all. Let's fully enjoy the mushroom life together!

name: Float: Champions
description: Float: Champions is an intense skill based platformer where players race to become the king of the hill. Knock down those who oppose you by launching anvils or dishing out slaps as you fight to stay at the top.

name: A Heroine Story
description: When a wizard comes to the village to help Victoria against a magical entity, things take a turn for the unexpected and the young mayor will have to make a decision that will change her life forever.

name: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: Rayman in the Phantom Show
description: In this brand-new adventure, separate from the main game’s storyline, players will control Rayman, Rabbid Peach and Rabbid Mario, as they discover the dramatic Space Opera Network, an uncanny TV studio full of props and easter eggs. This place is run by the Phantom, a previous antagonist from Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle, now reconverted as a studio director beyond reproach. As the TV studio’s rating is lower than ever, he needs the help of true stars to help him get his past glory back.

name: Rebellion Corporation
description: On planets occupied by robots, mine resources and escape while fending off their attacks! The Ark's survival is entirely in your hands. Many elite crews with abilities will assist you in your mission. The various turret modules are always doing their best to defend your base without your attention.

name: CyberTitans
description: CyberTitans is a multiplayer strategy game with crazy mechanics where you lead your Titans against the world. Recruit your Titans, position them on the field and send them into the battleground. Choose the smartest way to manage your economy during the game, merge Titans, level up your Totem or roll the cybershop to summon up to 44 unique characters.

name: Paladin's Passage
description: Paladin's Passage: Secrets of the Forgotten Realm casts players in the role of dwarvish Paladin, Thieren Cromlech, on a noble quest through the mythical land of Aramor, journeying through over 100 monster-filled dungeons to your goal. Will you be chosen to triumph and unveil the ancient secrets buried beneath Aramor?

name: Frogman Magmaborn
description: A story-based rogue-like startegy RPG. Discover story and characters each run, battle in diverse hand-crafted maps, and edit everything with the dedicated modding tool!

name: Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle
description: Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle is a third-person story-driven survival horror game prequel to the critically acclaimed Daymare: 1998. Step into the shoes of agent Dalila Reyes, a former government spy now in the service of H.A.D.E.S. unit and prepare to face the true horror.

name: Kimi sae Ireba
description: Hundreds of years later, humans and Heflites coexist on a hidden planet near Earth. Finding a mate is the goal, but will something like that really help her break free from the deep darkness she experienced as a child? "...This feeling...is not an obsession..."

name: Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles – Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- "Memories in Melody" Hardcover Art Book
- "Ballad of the Little Princess" 2-disc Original Soundtrack
- "Memories of Marl Kingdom" 2-disc Original Soundtrack
- "Royal Crescendo" Art Cards (Set of 3)
- "A Duet of Adventure" Acrylic Display
- "Generations of Song" Acrylic Display
- "The Show Must Go On" Cloth Poster
- Collector's Box

name: Aequor
description: Aequor is a 15-30 minute game about cave diving.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Leader Pass
description: Return to rule with the Civilization VI: Leader Pass. Lead your people to greatness with 12 leaders brand new to Civilization VI and 6 new takes on classic Civilization leaders.

name: Pixel Paint 2: Special Edition
description:
Pixel Paint 2 is a sequel to an extremely popular game by the same name. The rules are quite simple. Put your mind at ease, follow the numbers, and fill out every last pixel with the right color.

It's your first step in becoming an amazing pixel artist. Choose a theme you like and sink into the wonderful world of pixels.

Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery with the Health DLC!

name: Where the Two Flowers Meet
description: An indie psychological horror visual novel about the meaning of everything that has been lost, along with the memories of our time together.

name: Another Happiness
description: Minimalist RPG Maker conversational game

name: Samba de Amigo: Party-To-Go
description: Join Amigo and his friends in an all-new Samba de Amigo that takes the party wherever you go!

name: Nellie's Nonograms
description: A collection of nonograms made by friends and fans of the vtuber NellieAndGrits!

name: 01 Deadliest Zone Catch: Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator
description:
Embark on thrilling maritime adventures where you'll become a professional crab catcher and navigate the treacherous waters of Alaska. Earn a fortune while traveling on a large boat, battling dangerous natural disasters. And don't forget about those menacing crab claws!
Become a true captain. Manage your ship and utilize professional equipment to catch crabs in the vast Bering Sea. Explore the waters of Alaska, study crab migrations, and do everything possible to succeed even in the most turbulent days. Prepare yourself for exciting quests in search of wealth and glory on the open seas!
In "01 Deadliest Zone Catch — Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator" you'll have the opportunity to participate in perilous sea races for the best catch and capture crabs beyond your wildest dreams. Your task won't be easy—you'll have to contend with time constraints, weather conditions, crab migrations, and, most importantly, the unforgiving sea itself. This is your destiny on the waters of Alaska!
It will take all your courage and determination to conquer the deadly waves and build your own fortune in the world of crab catching. Take action and seize the opportunity to become a legend in "01 Deadliest Zone Catch — Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator"!

name: Dead by Daylight: Alien Chapter Pack
description: Dead by Daylight's Alien Chapter brings two iconic characters into The Fog: new Killer the Xenomorph and new Survivor Ellen Ripley. A new Map, Nostromo Wreckage, is available for all players. This Chapter Pack unlocks the Motion Tracker Charm, as well as the Very Rare Back in Action outfit for Ellen Ripley.

name: River City Girls 1, 2, and Zero Bundle
description: Clean up the mean streets of River City across three hard-hitting, knuckle-busting beat-'em-ups: River City Girls, River City Girls 2, and River City Girls Zero!

name: Dreamscape Puzzles
description: The beauties are magically sealed in the picture and need warriors to rescue them. Warriors come and rescue the beauties and bring them home!!

name: Pixel Puzzles Illustrations & Anime: Jigsaw Pack - Variety Pack XS
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 4
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki going to the Spa to relax, only to end up fucked senseless in the steamy sauna by a hunk of a man who doesn’t even bother telling her his name.

name: Superfetch Dog
description:
Play fetch as Gale the goodest boy.

Superfetch Dog a platformer where you need to fetch the orb for your owner. Run across various landscapes, jump over obstacles, climb trees, bark at small creatures, avoid dangerous wildlife, learn new tricks… Do anything you can to retrieve the orb before it’s too late!

Nothing can stop a good boy like Gale.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Joban Line - Shinagawa to Katsuta: E531-0 series
description: The Joban Line runs from Ueno Station in Taito-ku, Tokyo to Sendai Station in Sendai City, Miyagi Prefecture, via Chiba, Ibaraki, and Fukushima Prefectures, and is the longest line among all JR lines not named "Main Line.

name: Kuuruu Kenmonroku
description: A RPG in which a child of divine education travels around the world. Travel the world and expand your horizons with many unique friends.

name: Merchant Master
description: A simulation game. Start from scratch to build a merchant empire.

name: Anonymous Messages
description: You are lost in a bizarre looking forest. You can't remember anything… survive your time in the forest and recover some parts of your memory... Beware the Trees are Watching You O_O

name: Never Ending Nightmare
description: Life has been tough for you after the tragic incident with your parents. Your way of coping has been through reliving all the good memories with them, but all the memories had a dark turn this time... will you be able to figure out why?

name: The Eastern Drive
description: A fun and casual car driving game featuring Asian cars.

name: Scrumlords
description: Fight off hordes of angry peasants and reclaim your realm in Scrumlords! Lead your formation of loyal soldiers into battle in this action-roguelite, unlocking new gear and increasing your abilities as you play.

description: Play the history. Go behind the scenes of Jordan Mechner's landmark game Karateka in this interactive documentary from Digital Eclipse, with archival materials, video features, and more. Experience pixel-perfect versions of this legendary game, with all-new features.

In the year 3227… humanity is scattered across the solar system, connected only through Lifesight.

Follow Pilla, a cute and bubbly streamer as she decides to reinvent herself with a trip of a lifetime to a planet she’s never known! What might she discover in the Last Paradise on Earth?

description: Adam is a sci-fi based Rogue-like FPS game. High action and adventure await you in this futuristic universe. Fight by living the story of Yavuz with various weapons and excellent environments!

name: Samba de Amigo: Party Central - Digital Deluxe Edition

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Sonic the Hedgehog music DLC pack: Open your heart,
Reach for the Stars (Re-Colors), and I'm Here
- Sonic the Hedgehog and Tails costumes
- Space Channel 5, Super Monkey Ball, and PuyoPuyo costumes and accessories

description: An arcade puzzle game about arranging 3d blocks on a sphere.

name: Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles – Deluxe Edition

- Mini-artbook

name: Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles
description: Enjoy the next verse of Marl Kingdom adventures with Rhapsody II: Ballad of the Little Princess and Rhapsody III: Memories of Marl Kingdom! Join Kururu, the daughter of Cornet and Ferdinand, as she pursues her dreams of true love, and experience these classic RPGs in full forte as they take center stage! With improved visuals, a heart-warming story, a charming soundtrack, and an emotional conclusion, Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles comes ready to win your heart as it makes its welcome western debut!

description: Five friends go on a well deserved vacation. When they're offered a luxurious stay at Paradise Island, they have no idea what’s awaiting them! Drawn into a battle against mysterious creatures, our heroes unlock their magical potential - and the road to each other's hearts!

name: Under the Waves
description: Under the Waves is a narrative-driven adventure game about the engulfing power of grief. Set in the depths of the North Sea in a techno-futuristic 1970s, professional diver Stan is struggling to overcome a life-changing loss and embrace a new future. The isolation of the deep sea is a fitting manifestation of his state of mind, and as Stan retreads further into his self-imposed solitude, he starts to experience strange events far beneath the waves. Stuck between life and death, Stan will have to make the most significant choice of his existence.

But they’re about to have much bigger problems. Will they find time to figure themselves out? Can they balance a potential apocalypse and a budding romance? During hard times, what do we owe each other? Goodbye Volcano High is a cinematic narrative adventure about the beginning of a love story... and the end of an era.

Collect different pick-ups that change the different kinds of bullets you fire at enemies, slaying as many of these wicked beasts as you can.

The game is a continuation of the freeware "A Game with a Kitty" game series.

description:
Scientist 2023 is a Doom II partial conversion megawad by Roland van der Velden, first released on August 10, 2023, as a new official add-on for the Doom Classic Unity port, before seeing a standalone release as a PWAD 15 days later.

Scientist 2023 is a remake of 2002's Scientist and 2005's Scientist 2, two WADs by Roland Van der Velden featuring similar levels and themes. The 2023 remake features revamped levels, some remade from scratch, and also new graphics, weapons and enemies, with a remarkably different aesthetic from the previous works.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend Demake - Chapter One
description:
A re-imagined Legend experience in the classic TR engine! Tomb Raider: Legend originally came out in 2006 and was developed by Crystal Dynamics. Legend Demake is a fan-remake developed by Delca using an enhanced version of the TR4 engine (called TRNG). Gameplay and environments are reimagined how they would be like if they were made by Core Design in the late 90's - often referred to as the 'classic' era.

Chapter One includes four levels: Croft Manor, Bolivia, Peru, and Japan. The follow-up, consisting of the second half of the game, is in development.

The Story focuses on Lara's search for her mother and the mythical sword Excalibur. For the demake, the plot has been reworked and simplified in some aspects.

Cutscenes are dubbed in French. English subtitles are provided.
