Allows players to view concept art and listen to in-game music.

A new action game based on the core concept of the Armored Core series that utilizes the knowledge and experience gained from FromSoftware's recent action game development.

name: Chimeras: Heavenfall Secrets Collector's Edition
description: Astrid and Greta are the best of friends, but when she goes missing during the semester break at their magical school, Astrid needs your help as a detective to find her. As you dig deeper, you'll discover she's not the only student to vanish in these hallowed halls.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Variety Pack 7XS
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Panda Choice Mahjong
description: The panda has made her choice! Follow her into the wonderful world of the most ancient game.

name: Farming Tractor Simulator 2023: Drive Combine & Trucks
description: Start sowing the seeds of success today!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 4: Last Resort
description:
A season of Fortnite: Chapter 4

The fate of the Island's at stake in Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 4 Season 4, and thievery's the last resort. Are you in?

name: Save The Deal
description: A nostalgic retro game with a sticker-collecting mission! Watch the moving stickers closely and send the right coordinates on the chat to get them and fill the sticker card. The more you get, the more you advance!

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Premium Edition
description:
Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Premium Edition is exclusive to the Bandai Namco Store and comes with:

Full game
Garage - A garage where you can park your Armored Core, inspired by the one available in the game. Size: 32 cm
Armored Core Figurine - Size 19 cm
Steelbook - Original art steelbook case
Pin Badges - A set of 4 pin badges featuring in-game emblem patterns
Stickers - A set of 45 stickers to personalize your computer, mobile phone, etc.
Artbook - An exclusive 40-page hardcover artbook. Dive deep into the world of Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon with never-before-seen visuals.
Digital Soundtrack - The complete Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon original soundtrack

name: DreamWorks Kids Bundle
description: An Outright Games bundle in support of UNICEF. Featuring a collection of family fun games, available to purchase for a limited time.

name: TouhouSnowClash
description: Want to compete with your friends? TouHou Snowman Clash (THSC) provides a simple environment for three players to play tricks together! Compete who can assemble a cooler snowman, and don't forget to scare your friends.

name: Collectamon
description: Collectamon is a creature collecting game with an additional focus on upgrades. Upgrade your character, upgrade the area and place your caught monsters in your sanctuary. Catch all monsters in the game? Upgrade Everything? Try and get all achievements? It's up to you!

name: BoxFight
description: Made for fans of retro arcade games and newcomers alike, BoxFight is a fast-paced shooter game in which you must weave between the waves of enemies that come your way by rotating around the playing field, shooting them as you go in order to survive as long as possible inside of The Box!

name: The Simplest Game in the World
description: You can beat this game with any key on your keyboard. ANY key, I mean it.

name: Platform Gun
description: A sci-fi puzzle platformer using the platform gun

name: Hollybound
description: Introducing Hollybound: a game of underqualified heroes! A radioactive invasion is taking over Wayfield, and it's up to you to stop it! In this action-packed top-down shooter, you'll face inconvenient traffic, a crowded shopping mall, and even an Italian restaurant! ...It's cooler than it sounds.

name: License to Breed
description: Money, power, fame! The Amane family has it all... Well, except heirs to continue on the family name. Thus the Amane Patriarch has one final command: "Any fertile man in the Amane family must go out and breed at once! It shall be allowed any place, any where in the city. No exceptions."

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Multiplayer Mode with:

• 15 new levels and 7 new achievements
• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Precision
description: This is a simple 2d follow the mouse game where you have to get to the end to win! This game can be annoying and hard to get through levels but can be very fun! If you touch anything red you will die.

name: Alibi: The Dinner Party
description: Play as a Police Detective investigating a murder at a luxurious villa. When your old friend Jasmine Lee becomes the prime suspect, it's up to you to reveal the truth. Navigate a gripping case filled with twists and turns that'll leave you guessing until the very end.

name: Cosmic Survivor
description: A brutal, Roguelite Arcade Blaster. Similar in style and gameplay to arcade classics like Asteroids and Defender.

name: Little Devil: Foster Mayhem
description: Destroy furniture, mess up the house, and anger your foster parents!

name: Floating Cuboid
description: You are an infinitely jumping cube, that doesn't mean that the challenges in front of you become any easier however, sometimes it is hard to stop yourself and sometimes you go too far, but can you make it just like you were before, in one piece?

name: Fight! Olyn Island
description: Explore the mysterious Olyn Island! Play against other players and use cute animal heroes towards victory!

name: Wobble Warriors
description: Wobble Warriors is a 1-4 player ragdoll fighting couch co-op game. In this dungeon crawler, you and your friends play as some wobbly dragons on a mission to conquer the goblins who stole your gold. Jump, dash, ground pound, and bonk your way to victory by clearing each room.

name: Wildagotchi: Virtual Pet
description: The ultimate simulation game for all animal lovers.

name: Sayonara NightCap
description: Sin descripción

name: Experimentation
description: A linear visual novel about five short stories, unrelated at first glance. Be prepared for mysticism, gloomy atmosphere and light psychological horror. Not recommended to play if you are experiencing depression or severe psychological state.

name: Friendly Lab: Unlock
description:
Welcome, researcher. You will soon be conducting a gentle experiment on our two subjects. The experiment is a safe, secure and gentle one, involving no force, commands or torture.

A small, locked room with a clock. Two subjects with missing memories. A researcher. You. The final result will depend on you.

name: Three Days to Chicago
description: One of them is visiting a friend in Chicago. The other wants to shake things up in New York City. It starts in San Francisco, but where this relationship goes is all up to you.

name: Grand Tactician: The Civil War - Whiskey & Lemons
description: Start your own Career in the American Civil War. Create your character and sign up to fight for the Union or the Confederacy. Write your story through the war, and become one of the legendary commanders of the American Civil War!

name: Five Nations: Renegades
description: Renegades is the first official expansion pack of Five Nations, an old-school sci-fi real-time strategy game. It features a new campaign, new playable factions, units, stations, weapons, and skirmish maps.

name: Skinny Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Yume 3
description: YUME 3 is a maze break-through game. Players need to use the keyboard to control two characters to reach the designated position, and then they can enter the next level.

name: Giant Wishes
description: Follow Runi’s journey to become a giantess!

name: Bee Island
description: Take control of the hive and protect it from enemies. Build factories, wonders of the world and defence. Research technologies and, if necessary, use nuclear weapons, but do not let the enemies harm the queen!

name: Aikagi After Days
description: Aikagi After Days is the Steam release of the kinetic novel that depicts a young couple enjoying their college life together. If you enjoyed their blossoming love story in Aikagi, you will love this summer full of dates, swimming, fireworks, travel... and maybe just some studying.

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Collector's Edition
description:
Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Collector's Edition, exclusive to Bandai Namco Store, comes with the full game, plus the following items:

Armored Core Figurine - Size 19 cm
Steelbook - Original art Steelbook case
Pin Badges - A set of 4 pin badges featuring in-game emblem patterns
Stickers - A set of 45 stickers to personalize your computer, mobile phone, etc.
Artbook - An exclusive 40-page hardcover artbook. Dive deep into the world of the game with never-before-seen visuals
Digital Soundtrack - The complete original soundtrack

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Launch Edition
description: In Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon, players will assemble their mech from a wide variety of parts and weaponry to soar freely through mission locales that redefine three-dimensional mobility. Face down overwhelming opposition by outgunning and overrunning your enemies with dynamic movement that makes full use of ranged and melee combat. Players can experience frenetic and fast-paced action that can only be truly achieved with mechs.

name: Kingdom Incremental
description: Kingdom Incremental is a satirical city builder and incremental game. To be the wealthiest ruler, you must build a fortified settlement and balanced economy, strategically invest in upgrades, and expand your kingdom across the globe! Then burn everything down to start again with even more power!

name: Brie Parmesan Mysteries
description: Brie Parmesan, master detective is a stealthy rat navigating the criminal underworld of Chicatgo in search of cheese and collecting evidence to solve cases and bring the Cat Meofia to justice.

name: Elemental Survivors
description: Grind, die, upgrade, repeat in this auto-attacking roguelite/RPG! Transform into an enemy-blender with your fave attacks made devastating with equipment, party members, and elemental boosts. Survive to earn gems to unlock areas, permanent upgrades, characters, magical mounts, and god-like summons.

name: Love Too Easily
description: A sweet kiss memory of last night. Lost cell phone. Three suspects. Become the main character's helper, choose, collect hints and clear the mini-games. A full-scale mystery rom-com interactive movie.

name: The Devil's Face
description: This horror game offers a unique and unforgettable experience, taking you on a journey into the heart of madness and terror.

name: Don Duality
description: Don Duality is a tycoon game with card mechanics. Send your gangsters to beat out debts, rob banks, steal valuables and launder the money they earn in your establishment. Hire staff for your restaurant and upgrade it

name: Smells Like Burnt Rubber
description: Get ready for a fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled racing experience with Smells Like Burnt Rubber. Choose your car, customize it, and hit the track in this intense arcade-style game. Play with up to 4 friends in Splitscreen or join the Online Multiplayer. Are you ready to burn some rubber?

name: 4 The Elements
description: 4 The Elements is a 2D Action Platformer inspired by the best games of this genre from the 90s. Switch in real time between the four elements of nature to overcome challenges, acquire new abilities and defeat powerful bosses in beautifully crafted thematic stages.

name: 1986 Scary Mr. Chainsaw Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Lively Knight
description:
In this infinite runner you'll need to test your reactions skills. Differents ennemies are running to stop you so focus and slash through them all !

Unlock new skins by doing challenges and embody your favorite knight !

name: Saints Row: SteelSeries Cosmetic Pack
description: For Glory! Saints Row and SteelSeries have partnered up on this FREE cosmetic pack featuring an exclusive Saints Row headset and long sleeve t-shirt for your Boss.

name: Saints Row: Chicken Dinner Cosmetic Pack
description: Everyone’s a winner with this calorie-tastic Cosmetic Pack celebrating one of Santo Ileso’s finest eateries. They say you are what you eat, so your Boss should feel right at home kitted out head-to-toe like the mascot of Ned’s Diner!

name: Saints Row: Saints Criminal Customs
description: The Saints Criminal Customs includes two specially adorned bonus items; the elaborately styled Saints Custom Convertible and the equally signature Saints Custom Stab Jacket.

name: Saints Row: Los Panteros American Muscle Bundle
description: Pummel your enemies in style with this customized heavy duty gear. Cruise round Santo Ileso on the blazing orange custom Panteros Motorocycle. If anyone dares to get in your way, hop offf and hit them hard with the 'El Lanzador' dual-handed high impact slugger.

name: Saints Row: Idols Anarchy Pack
description: Don the iconic digitized DJ Helmet to light up your enemies faces before smashing them unconscious with the Idols Twinkle Bat, all to the sound of broken glass, before speeding off on your stolen neon-illuminated Sandstorm Scrambler bike.

name: Saints Row: Going Commando Cosmetic Pack
description: Steal in style with the Going Commando Cosmetic Pack. Get sneaky with a new Boss outfit and tactical weapon, and give those explosive heists a touch of class. You may be a criminal but you’re still a professional, right?!

name: Saints Row: Front to Back Cosmetic Pack
description: Half the citizens of Santo Ileso don’t know whether they’re coming or going, and neither will you with this marvellously multifaceted Cosmetic Pack celebrating the Weird Wild West! Don your hat, pull up your cowboy boots, and strap in to your custom Hollybird. Keep It Strange Santo!

name: Dune Dasher
description: Endless Desert Destruction

name: Crossout: Electric beetle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Void Equation
description:
30 minutes left until the girl's death...
The Void Equation is a short science fiction visual novel.

name: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo: Kokuu no Houteishiki
description: 30 minutes left until the girl's death... "Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo" is a short science fiction visual novel that pays homage to "Cold Equations" and "Trolley Problem". You will be forced to make a life choice: a girl who stows away on a spaceship to meet her mother, or a group of victims of a space accident waiting to be rescued. Choose the life you want to save and see the girl's fate.

name: Pokémon
description: Pokémon is a browser based mobile game by McDonald's made as a part of their Pokémon TCG 2023 Happy Meal promotion.

name: Intrusion
description: Doomguy invades a techbase full of demons. This is my first map that uses custom textures, and used Essel's amazing pack.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 3: First Ones
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 3
description:
An exciting season pass that includes 4 additional playable characters, stages and season 3 pass bonus character colors as additional DLC for the Guilty Gear -Strive- game.

Season Pass 3 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and 2 color packs for the new characters. The first pack unlocks 6 color variations, including the ultimate edition colors, and the exclusive second pack unlocks extra colors 13-15, which are the 3 anniversary color variations.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season 3 Character Additional Colors
description: An additional color pack including 6 colors for the 4 additional characters of GGST Season 3 (total of 24 colors).

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Full Game plus Arcade + Character DLC Pack Bundle
description: Experience monstrous beat-'em-up action with the full Dawn of the Monsters game plus the DLC in one kaiju-crushing combo!

name: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade + Character DLC Pack
description: Experience monstrous beat-'em-up action with the full Dawn of the Monsters game plus the DLC in one kaiju-crushing combo!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Daredevil Edition
description:
The Daredevil Edition of Guilty Gear -Strive- includes the base game, Season Pass 1, Season Pass 2, Season Pass 3, the Ultimate Edition Content Kit and the Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack.

Season Pass 1 includes 5 characters, 2 stages, an exclusive story expansion and the Additional Character Color Pack which adds 5 color variations for all 20 characters announced with its release.

Season Pass 2 and 3 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and a Color Pack which unlocks 6 color variations for the 4 characters in the related pass. Season Pass 3 also has an exclusive Color Pack with 3 additional color variations for its characters that missed both 25th Anniversary Color Packs.

Ultimate Edition Contents Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and the Ultimate Edition Special Colors which adds 1 color variant for all 20 characters available with Season Pass 1. A color variant in the Season Pass 2 and 3 Color Packs matches the Ultimate Edition color variation for their characters.

The Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary Special Additional Color Pack unlocks 2 color variations for the 24 characters available at the end of Season Pass 2.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Kaguya Otsutsuki
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Kaguya Otsutsuki as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: J-Jump Arena
description: A turn based, jumping elimination game where everything happens all at once! Learn to be precise with your jumps and weapon handling, as well as in the art of outsmarting your opponents! Multiplayer for up to 10 players and single player mode available.

name: The Bunnyman
description: Your roommate, Tyler, decided to go camping with some friends a couple of weeks ago near Fairfax Station. He hasn't been seen in almost a month. Although you have tried to reach out and contact him, he has not responded. Fearing the worst, you decide to go and investigate to see if you can find him. Along the way, you realize that something sinister is happening behind the scenes.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Kakuro
description: A classic logic puzzle that's immensely fun!

name: Chat Simulator: Blind Dates
description: Delve into blind dates in this fun graphic novel. Will you get to know the four women and their personalities?

name: Sagashimono ha, Natsu desuka.
description: Sagashimono ha, Natsu desuka. is a visual novel game.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Complete Edition
description: Sniper Elite 5 Complete Edition includes the base game, Season Pass One, and Season Pass Two.

name: Arcade Archives: Bosconian
description:
"BOSCONIAN" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1981.
Take control of a space patrol fighter and take down the space pirate BOSCONIAN!
Enemy bases can be destroyed by destroying all of their turrets or by firing missiles into the center of the base, which will cause a massive explosion.
Destroy all the enemy bases in a round to clear each stage.

name: Trainz 2022 DLC: Blue Comet 2.0 - The Seashore's Finest Train
description: Jump aboard the famous Blue Comet passenger train, hauled by the CNJ's powerful G3s pacifics in blue or black liveries, or the later weathered version as the P47 class. The package features the Baldwin G3s pacific locomotive, in both blue and clean and dirty black liveries, and a custom cab view.

name: Trainz 22: Platinum Edition Features
description: Trainz 22 Platinum Edition includes Surveyor 2.0 (new world building tools) and all 6 routes from Trainz 22 plus 5 additional routes and 21 locomotives!

name: Trainz Plus DLC: Blue Comet 2.0 - The Seashore's Finest Train
description: Jump aboard the famous Blue Comet passenger train, hauled by the CNJ's powerful G3s pacifics in blue or black liveries, or the later weathered version as the P47 class. The package features the Baldwin G3s pacific locomotive, in both blue and clean and dirty black liveries, and a custom cab view.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Daemons of Khorne
description: The warp-fuelled manifestations of rage and violence are the latest playable faction in Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector. Eight murderous units, including the dreaded Daemon Prince, are available to bring Chaos to the galaxy.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 10: Johnny
description: This allows the character "Johnny" to be used in-game.

name: Edge of War
description: Edge of War delivers an isometric, turn-based CRPG where the world reacts to you. All side quests are main quests, as every decision matters and impacts the fate of the Northlands. Explore and complete missions, but keep your heroes on their toes: the wilds do not forgive.

name: No Man's Sky: Echoes
description: Meet a secret society of robotic aliens in update 4.4, ECHOES! Furthering the narrative introduced in INTERCEPTOR, explore the mysteries of the Autophage, perform their rituals, learn their language, and assemble your own ceremonial staff. In deep space, confront huge outlaw dreadnoughts, sweep through their trenches and destroy vulnerable components in new tactical space combat – and much more!

name: Desktop Basketball 2
description: Invigorating basketball everyone can enjoy together! Prepare for the next evolution in dunking!

name: Northgard: Kernev, Clan of the Stoat
description: Independent and protective, the populations of Kernev occupy autonomous territories, but they will unite in battle under the command of their powerful Lords. Nominoe's knowledge of Viking cultures and diplomatic ways give the Kingdom the adaptability and allies to match any challenge.

name: Undawn: Desert Fury
description:
In the Desert Fury update, you will get the following:
- New map: Golden Desert
- New story: The Abyss
- New Settlement: Junkyard - Carnival Land for the Owls
- New Roles :Troubadour & Highwayman
- New Events

And much more!

name: Flag Defender!
description: Get ready to defend the flag and prove your strategic prowess!

name: Icarus: Everbark Outpost
description: A Waterfall, underwater caves and a picturesque lake are the highlights of this lush forest environment to build your dream base surrounded by nature.

name: Icarus: Tecton Outpost
description: The large oasis, precarious cliffs or near the twin waterfalls gives you an abundance of interesting locations to build your desert refuge on this outpost map.

name: Icarus: Cactus Outpost
description: Whitewater rapids, picturesque archways and sand dunes provide an idyllic setting to build your dream Desert base.

name: Word Search Puzzle: Find the Words!
description: Word Search is a classic word puzzle to search for words! Spell the words and the word puzzles will be completed!

name: Uncharted Ocean: Adventures at the Poles
description: This is a world of oceans, islands and ships. Players will start their own journey from Faro, facing an impermanent ocean and awkward opponents, and gradually build a strong fleet with wisdom and luck. The chaotic seas and tempting treasures, under the guidance of the banner, work hard for survival!

name: Just Hit The Button
description: Hit the button to win. The simplest game ever.

name: My Little Career
description: My Little Career is a visual novel for adults only. The story of a young girl who moved from a distant suburb to the big city to become a photo model, but everything is not so easy, the world of big business is much more complicated than she expected, but she will stop at nothing.

name: Fire Shark
description: Get ready for classic shoot-'em-up action in Toaplan's Fire Shark, now on PC with modern updates. An evil and overwhelmingly powerful military force is about to take over not only a small country, but the whole world... Defeat the enemy and accept your place of honor!

name: Road to Top G
description: Survive waves of zombies, collect perks, unlock boss door, and face Andrew Tate in an intense showdown. Can you conquer the Top G?

name: Color Splash: Dogs
description: Color Splash: Dogs is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable dogs and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful dog paintings.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Star Trek: The Next Generation
description: Experience an out-of-this-galaxy pinball adventure on the Star Trek: The Next Generation Williams Pinball Machine! Join Captain Picard on the U.S.S. Enterprise-D and fight against Romulans, Cardassians, and the Borg!

name: One Life Clicker
description: A unique idle clicker game with RPG elements and hardcore survival mode with only one life available

name: Omega Strikers: Season 2 - Summer Splash
description: Throw on your bathing suit, get on that sunscreen, grab a towel and a 6 pack of Super Surge.

name: Retro Revengers
description: A retro-style adventure platformer game, inspired by hits of the past and featuring wonderful music created by Manami Matsumae, will take you on an eventful journey through the diverse environmental stages to encourage you to save the world of retro gaming.

name: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo Kokuu no Houteishiki
description: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo Kokuu no Houteishiki is an adventure indie game.

name: Flying Shark
description: Experience Toaplan's arcade shooter Flying Shark (AKA Sky Shark) on PC with the latest quality-of-life features. Ride through the skies as they burn in a rain of armor-piercing bullets! You have been chosen for the mission. Because you are the best pilot there is!

name: Icarus: New Frontiers
description: New Frontiers expands Icarus with a whole new map with hazardous environments, alien life and weather. Advance the story with six new chained narrative missions that delve into the mysteries of this alien planet. Extend your experience with 100+ new items to craft, collect, build, deploy and use.

name: D.C. III PS: Da Coda III - Plus Story
description:
The sakura that bloomed year-round is now a thing of the past and Hatsune Island is now known as an island that shows the beauty of each season.

Kiyotaka is a second-year student at Kazami Academy who is part of the news club along with the school idol Rikka, his younger sister-like childhood friend Himeno, his mixed-race cousin Charles, a hard-working junior who skipped a grade and is in his class Sara, and energetic in spirit but weak in body Aoi.

Unlike in the past, there are no more mysterious things happening on the island. That was until one winter day when the sakura began to bloom. All the news club members got a message on their cell phones telling them to do something at a promised place when the sakura begins to bloom. They couldn’t make out the rest of the message but are surprised that it was dated 1951. Rikka was extremely curious about the message and the sudden blooming of the sakura, so she called on everyone to solve the mystery with her.

name: Blasphemous II: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Penitent One awakens as Blasphemous 2 joins him once again in an endless struggle against The Miracle. Dive into a perilous new world filled with mysteries and secrets to discover.
Includes a Digital Soundtrack and a Digital Artbook.

name: Tunguska: Shadow Master
description: Enjoy enhanced stealth gameplay in Tunguska with new melee and steath weapons and a new game mode: Sticks-And-Stones.

name: Girls in Pajamas
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Truth
description: Step into the role of judge on a new reality show and award the one million dollar prize to the contestant you feel most deserves it. There are six contestants hooked up to lie detectors who must answer any question you ask them. Vote one off each round until only the winner remains.

name: Lovely Brides
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Sweety Sweets
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: We Need to Cook
description: We need to cook! You are a drug-designing genius, living a bland existence in a middle-class neighborhood in Utah. You decide you want more out of life, so you buy a beat-up RV, drive it into the desert, and cook drugs. Make immense profits!

name: Versus Vampire
description: Take part in the eternal battle between Vampires and Humans. Choose your camp and fight in this new online multiplayer action game.

name: Jetpack Kiwi
description: Jetpack Kiwi is a classic 2D side scrolling shoot em up game featuring 20 levels, 5 bosses, hordes of enemies spaceships, with multiple characters to choose from; each one with an unique special attack. Complete the game in single player or with a friend in local co-op!

name: Battlepopes
description: Battlepopes is a multiplayer online 2D MOBA in a sidescrolling arena, featuring cooldown-based combat. Stuck in hell forever, as punishment for their wicked lives, ancient Popes and Antipopes fight in the eternal inferno. Come rot.

name: Famous Duo Bundle
description: Put your intuition and logic to the test as you investigate a multitude of mind-bending and gripping cases, make your deductions and ultimately, difficult moral choices.

name: Marauder of Dystopia: The Weakest Go To The Wall
description:
The people of the Omega Empire suffer under the oppressive rule of Emperor Duke—but a beautiful, dark-haired woman, sword in hand, has risen up to assassinate oppressors until the people are free!

Marauder of Dystopia: The Weakest Go To The Wall is a doujin RPG from ONEONE1 featuring animated battles and more.

name: Forbidden Magic
description: You’re a new paranormal agent with a tricky case. With your hellhound partner and devil boss, can you catch a magical arsonist before you lose your heart?

name: Mediterranea Inferno
description: Explore the inner demons of three childhood friends on a summer retreat. Unearth secrets, fears and obsessions as you help them reconnect and rediscover themselves. A mature and treacherous visual novel from the creator of Milky Way Prince - The Vampire Star.

name: Apartament 1406
description: Apartment 1406 is a horror game that will give you an amazing experience in a dark horror world. The game introduces psychological elements such as ever-changing environments and two alternate worlds, which makes it very interesting and mysterious. The player must face various unknown phenomena, ghosts and demons, which combined with the dark and gloomy atmosphere will give you great emotions.
